thumb.title: Let's Play Sonic Cure Modulation (English Fandub)
thumb.description: [REUPLOADED/HIGH QUALITY]Taken from: https://web.archive.org/web/20220610205459mp_/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CGwBkJnwZ6IThis animation comes from Sasi_Sage from NicoVideo and YT channel. I replaced the Japanese dialog to English. Thank you ShadowRemix for doing the voice of Shadow.Original date upload: 01/19/2014
